description: Metaschema for validating the structure of the per-doctype schemas in this repository

mozPipelineMetadata.description: Container for per-doctype metadata that can affect how pings are processed in the pipeline

bq_dataset_family.description: The base name for the destination BigQuery dataset; if this is set to 'telemetry', the pipeline will write into 'telemetry_live'

delete_after_days.description: If present, a time_partitioning_expiration policy will be set on the destination stable table in BigQuery

collect_through_date.description: If present, the pipeline will reject new data with submission_timestamp after the given date, sending it to error output

jwe_mappings.description: Mappings of encrypted JWE field paths to destinations where the value decrypted by the pipeline should be placed; currently only used for Account Ecosystem Telemetry; paths may indicate nested fields with dots such as 'payload.ecosystemAnonId'
